column7: A survey of mathematical topics for students in information sciences. Provides an introduction to sets, relations, graphs, grammars, probability, and propositional and predicate logic. These topics relate to applications in information modeling, representation and expression. Prerequisite: MATH 112 or Required ALEKS Score.
column9: Prerequisite: MATH 112 or Required ALEKS Score.
column26: Grad Sch of Lib & Info Science
